text: ERROR. You may have set an incorrect text id.
This minimal text dialog node uses default values, and will end shortly.

superfluous_example.name: Name
text: Required value.

choices.self_comment: janky way to say: different next id by choice depending on condition

choices.text: You haven't talked to me before.
I see you've talked to me before.

next: default_id, must always be last and a string

text: Welcome, [rainbow freq=0.2 sat=10 val=20][wave amp=50 freq=2]&[/wave][/rainbow].
Every hero needs a sword.
So,| go forth hero, |with this instrument ye shall find...
...a brave new world.
Help! Help! Aaaaah!
Wha? Oh! You there! You're carrying a sword. So you must be one of those...uh...h-heros!?!?!
Thank goodness!
These slimes have been terrorizing the village nearby. Please eliminate the monsters that blight this world.
(Click to attack.)
Please, hero! Eliminate the monster that has been terrorizing this village and killing off all the innocent sheeples.
Hello, sir! Would you like to cross the river?
Yes,| &,| indeed...| I am.
Sorry, buddy, I'm a one-way boat.

bunny_quest.name: Moon Bunny
text: Boy, have you got my mochi?

bunny_quest_not_done.name: Moon Bunny
text: Don't keep me waiting, boy.

bunny_quest_done.name: Moon Bunny
text: Wonderful!
You picked up a mochi!

tweet.name: Tweety
text: Hey yo! Have you heard about the new tweet?

choices.text: Yes, no need to say anymore.

tweet_no_joke.name: Tweety
text: Aw c'mon man, I was just try'n to make a joke. Play along, you big ol' sop.

tweet_joke.name: Tweety
text:
Well, they just couldn't stop tweeting! | 
 [shake rate=5 level=10] HAHA!! | HAHA!![/shake]
Well? Did you like it?

bunny_general.name: Moon Bunny
text: Hrmph! And who are you to be wandering into moon bunny territory?

bunny_general2.name: Moon Bunny
text: Oh, and what business are you on to be here?

scarred_bunny.name: Moon Bunny Guard
text: Monster! Get away from this sacred land.
Oh? Ye hold the sacred sword. So you must be one of those heroes. And ye wish to pass through the sacred land?

scarred_bunny1.name: Moon Bunny Guard
text: I see...well, even if ye hold the sacred sword, we still don't trust just anyone to trespass through the sacred land.
Prove to me ye are worthy...only those with the sacred amulet, blessed by the sacred gods, may pass.

scarred_bunny2.name: Moon Bunny Guard
text: Yes, I guard the sacred lands. Or to be more precise, the purgatory just before the sacred lands. It's a place for villagers to seek safety from the monsters that lurk outside and to be cleansed of their sins.

choices.text: I would like to pass through.

text: Authorized personel beyond this point only.
The paper boat floats serenely as if in water.
